selected_skills.name: extract_text_from_image
selected_skills.purpose: To extract the ages of Alice and Bob from the image.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to obtain the text from the image, which includes the ages of Alice and Bob.

selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: To calculate the age gap between Alice and Bob.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to compute the difference between the ages of Alice and Bob.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: To format the final answer as required.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to format the computed age gap into the final answer format.
